version_description: Provided iOS9 compatibility along with minor bug fixes.
This new release adds WhatsApp sharing functionality to the Gulf News app. It also fixes an issue with incorrect time stamps on stories.
We have fixed a number of bugs including your feedback about crashes on iOS devices. Thanks for your continued feedback!

We have completely revamped our app to ensure our readers get the best that new technology can bring. Make sure you download the new app today in order to ensure an uninterrupted Gulf News service on your smartphone and tablet.

What you'll find in this update:
- A complete redesign of the front end - smoother, faster, easier to read
- A complete reworking of the technology - the app is now fast and lighter, and more stable
- Saved Articles: If you see an article you want to read later, you can now save it to your favourites
- Easier navigation - simply swipe to the right for the next article or section
- A significantly upgraded tablet experience
- Prayer Times and the latest gold prices

This is the first release of a significantly improved app, and paves the way for a significant number of new features on the way exclusively for our app users.

We have completely revamped our app to ensure our readers get the best that new technology can bring. Make sure you download the new app today in order to ensure an uninterrupted Gulf News service on your smartphone and tablet.

What you'll find in this update:
- A complete redesign of the front end - smoother, faster, easier to read
- A complete reworking of the technology - the app is now fast and lighter, and more stable
- Saved Articles: If you see an article you want to read later, you can now save it to your favourites
- Easier navigation - simply swipe to the right for the next article or section
- A significantly upgraded tablet experience
- Prayer Times and the latest gold prices

This is the first release of a significantly improved app, and paves the way for a significant number of new features on the way exclusively for our app users.

·         Bug fixes for speed & stability.
·         Sponsored and Partner Content from Reach by GN is now viewable within the app.
This new release adds WhatsApp sharing functionality to the Gulf News app. It also fixes an issue with incorrect time stamps on stories.

• Personalisation now available to curate your own feed
• High impact design, more visual
• Precise search
• Exclusive content to the app curated via Top Stories
• New video section
• Local cinema listings
• Rich media notifications
• New branding and logo

Added new Video Categories
Minor enhancements on the home screen
Bug fixes and enhancements
- Improved performance on Article Detail Page.

- Improved performance on Article Detail Page.
- Now push notification can be turned on and off from the Settings.
Enabled 3D Touch with quick links to Prayer Timings, Cinema Listings , Gold & Forex.

A complete redesign emphasizing speed and simplicity, browse latest and breaking news with ease and find what you’re looking for faster.
Easy switch between main news sections from top sliding bar.
Side menu makes it easier to reach hot news and useful topics.
Quickly navigate between main application sections with the tab bar.

Optimize memory usage to decrease app memory footprint
Bug fixes

For better and faster navigation between sections appearing on top tabs, Tapping on Gulf News logo will go to Top Stories
Other UX enhancements

Add sign in by Apple ID
Bug fixes and enhancements

Fix time remaining to Sunrise in Prayer Times.
Add Imsak time in Prayer Times.
Other hotfixes.
